column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center and LFUCG offices will be closed on Monday February 20 for the Presidents' Day holiday.
Traffic reports will resume Tuesday February 21 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Georgetown Rd at Citation Blvd:
column4: All inbound lanes are blocked due to a collision reportedly involving a semi and an ambulance.

column3: Traffic Alert for Georgetown Rd at Citation Blvd:
column4: All inbound traffic on Georgetown Rd is being diverted onto Citation Blvd toward Newtown Pike.
